model_input:

The husband feels supported by his wife in pursuing activities that make him happy outside of work and family life, and the wife is glad that the husband has a friend he can trust and enjoy spending time with. Event Description: Husband had a great time hanging out with his friend and catching up on ideas for a new project. He is looking forward to working on the project and believes in the importance of having interests outside of work. prediction:
